message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but $90 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $75 for it. Can you meet me in the middle?
Hi Bob, I understand that $90 might be a bit high for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $75. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though! I can offer it to you for $82.50. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $82.50 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $80 for it. Can you see if you can do any better?
